answerText: Derek Alton Walcott[10] This other Caribbean author wrote of Ganesh Ramsumair in The Mystic Masseur and described Bogart and Popo, two of the residents of the title road in Miguel Street.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 2 | 17 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Answer the following about authors who were born in the Caribbean. [10] This Saint Lucian author wrote the recent prize-winning poetry collection White Egrets as well as the play Dream on Monkey Mountain and the epic poem Omeros.
